title: Vikings-Bears MNF Recap: Resurgence continues for Minnesota, while Chicago still in freefall (Football 11/17)
description:
The streak is over! No, not the Bears' skid, but Kirk Cousins career 9-game losing streak on Monday Night Football finally came to an end. On this episode, Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to recap MNF. As wild as it sounds, does Minnesota have a shot at the playoffs? Meanwhile, Chicago is trending in the opposite direction, so the Pick Six Superfriends make sure to break down their woes.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix

Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
